subject: p18767957
History: W/ ESRD s/p failed kidney txp on HD, HIV, DM2, PVD, dCHF w/ preserved EF, s/p L TMA, s/p L BKA, now febrile and diaphoretic, cardiopulmonary process.
Impression: Cardiomegaly is substantial. Right basal consolidation is new and concerning for infectious process. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax is seen.
